entry.title: #JulyOT Is Coming!
entry.summary: We can't believe it's already the last week of June!! Wait - you know what that means right? Clear up your cables, dust off your Raspberry Pi, fire up your Visual Studio Code, and login to that Azure portal. It's time to celebrate the Internet of Things, one thing at a time!
entry.content: We can't believe it's already the last week of June!! Wait - you know what that means right? Clear up your cables, dust off your Raspberry Pi, fire up your Visual Studio Code, and login to that Azure portal. It's time to celebrate the Internet of Things, one thing at a time!
